name: Seges.GitHub.io
body:
# Welcome to Seges Open-Source corner

Here you find nice index of projects we are opening to the community.

## Docker

* [mug](http://seges.github.io/mug/) - Ultimate developer's tool to govern his local environment utilizing Docker
  * [mug-data](https://github.com/seges/mug-data) - Default developer data container for mug
* [cutlery](http://seges.github.io/cutlery) - Discovery, proxying and basid Docker environment for your development machine or production environment
* [openmq](https://github.com/seges/docker-openmq) - Docker image of OpenMQ message broker server

## Infrastructure

* [Tomcat Control Center](https://github.com/seges/tomcat-control-center)

## Chef

* [Grive](https://github.com/seges/chef-cookbook-grive) - Google Drive for Linux
* [Mass Backup](https://github.com/seges/chef-cookbook-mass-backup)
* [OpenMQ](https://github.com/seges/chef-cookbook-openmq)
* [Pencil](https://github.com/seges/chef-cookbook-pencil) - Pencil Wireframing tool
* [Proxy Driver](https://github.com/seges/chef-cookbook-proxydriver)
* [Tomcat Control Center](https://github.com/seges/chef-cookbook-tcc)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
